
The objective is to **research the feasibility and potential** of using **Multivariate LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory)** models for time series prediction. The analysis was conducted by reviewing an existing methodology for pollution forecasting, followed by applying these techniques to a sample dataset (NFTY data) from **BAJAJ-AUTO**.

For access to the source code and further documentation, please refer to the following links:

- **Multivariate LSTM implentation document**: [Documentation Link](https://machinelearningmastery.com/multivariate-time-series-forecasting-lstms-keras/)

- **Google Collab Link**: [Multivariate LSTM ](https://colab.research.google.com/#fileId=https%3A//storage.googleapis.com/kaggle-colab-exported-notebooks/notebook988f384b51-6fc92ded-c074-41ce-9248-5d811db36077.ipynb%3FX-Goog-Algorithm%3DGOOG4-RSA-SHA256%26X-Goog-Credential%3Dgcp-kaggle-com%2540kaggle-161607.iam.gserviceaccount.com/20241120/auto/storage/goog4_request%26X-Goog-Date%3D20241120T110126Z%26X-Goog-Expires%3D259200%26X-Goog-SignedHeaders%3Dhost%26X-Goog-Signature%)
